Unwilling unable sign ICF Unable understand study history noncompliance medical device Contradicted implantation surgery due following : renal sufficiency , urethral diverticulum , fistula , significant prolapse condition , pregnant , pelvic cancer , compromise immune system , vulvar pain , blood coagulation disorder , chronic abscess Pelvic prolapse great grade 3 Is , investigator 's opinion , otherwise unsuitable study
